title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 204.11 - Organizations prohibited from offering facility operator certification courses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 204.11 - Organizations prohibited from offering facility operator certification courses

State Regulations

No course provider seeking the approval of a natural organic
reduction certification course shall be affiliated or associated with, owned, operated or controlled by a funeral entity. Notes

R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
204.11

Adopted

New

York State Register August 7, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 32, eff. 8/7/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
